description: Your backcountry kit – tools that withstand rugged conditions and perform at the point of need – gives you the freedom to find new lines. The Rush is an essential component. Light and durable, the 80D 3L GORE-TEX fabric with GORE C-KNIT™ backer technology delivers waterproof, windproof protection with enhanced breathability. The StormHood™ adjusts for improved peripheral vision, an embedded RECCO® reflector can aid search and rescue, pit zippers ventilate, and multiple pockets organize small essentials.<br><br>Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of their commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.<br><br>Size and Fit Tips: Regular Fit - Their classic fit is cut comfortably throughout the chest, waist, hip, and thigh. It allows freedom of movement, provides shape, and layers comfortably over their insulation and midlayers. Be sure to double-check their new sizing charts before checkout.<br>
name: Rush Jacket - Womens

specs.value: 80D 3L GORE-TEX fabric with GORE C-KNIT™ backer with PFCec-free DWR - Bluesign Approved Material
